title: More Bits from Blinkbonny. ... Second edition
author: Strathesk, John
snippet: In winter the ice on the " Damhead " had its fewskaters, but its shoals of sliders, crying, " Clear theroad !" " Keep the puddin' bet!" faUing in heaps,scrambling out, and up and at it again. There werealso " snaw-ba' bickers;" but as these are in everyvillage, I must not further tax the reader's patienceon the subject, for schoolboy and schoolgirl hfe ismuch the same to-day as it was sixty years ago.
